tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  customer_id INT,
  feedback TEXT,
  sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE surveys (
  survey_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  survey_date DATE,
  rating INT,
  feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  rating INT,
  review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE support_tickets (
  ticket_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  ticket_date DATE,
  issue_description TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
  analysis_id INT,
  review_id INT,
  sentiment_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  sentiment_label VARCHAR(10),
  analysis_date DATE
);
